DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study provide opportunity patient exhibit progressive disease receive placebo companion 93-04-11 study receive ONTAK . It also design determine effectiveness ONTAK Cutaneous T-cell Lymphoma ( CTCL ) patient whose tumor express CD25 .
